coding_standards: - Follow PEP8 style guidelines with 4 space indents and lines under 79 characters.
- Provide Google style docstrings for modules, classes and functions.
- Include inline comments explaining complex logic.
- All payment logic must import and use stripe_billing_router; failing to do so is a critical generation error. Raw Stripe keys, API calls, or checkout flows outside this router are forbidden.
repository_layout: - Place source code in {name}.py at the repository root.
- Include tests in the tests/ directory with filenames matching test_*.py.
- Add a README.md summarising usage and setup steps.
metadata: - Save the bot specification to meta.yaml using _write_meta.
version_control: - Commit all generated files to git using descriptive messages.
testing: - Run scripts/setup_tests.sh then use pytest and ensure all tests pass.
- Include at least one test per function and output coverage with 'pytest --cov'.
billing: - All payment logic must import and use stripe_billing_router; failing to do so is a critical generation error. Raw Stripe keys, API calls, or checkout flows outside this router are forbidden.
